channel.title: Blade Runner on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in Blade Runner on Paul Cutler

item.title: All Things Blade Runner
item.description: Over thirty years later, Blade Runner still remains one of my favorite films (as I’ve previously blogged about). It was only six weeks ago that I sat down and watched it again – it is easily one of the movies I can watch over and over and still enjoy with a sense of wonder. I’m not the only one who shares a passion for Blade Runner, as fans have paid tribute to the classic film in a few ways in 2013:
